env.info: (hold 0) (plate 0) (at 0 1) (sort 1 couch) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 chair) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 closet) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (closed 3) (sort 4 cupboard) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (type 4 container) (opened 4) (sort 5 microwave) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 human) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (sort 7 book) (size 7 small) (color 7 blue) (sort 8 book) (size 8 small) (color 8 green) (sort 9 cup) (size 9 small) (color 9 red) (sort 10 bottle) (size 10 small) (color 10 red) (sort 11 book) (size 11 small) (color 11 red)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X closet) (type X container)))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X cupboard) (type X container))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green) (sort Y microwave) (type Y container))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red) (sort Y microwave) (type Y container))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X chair))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y microwave) (type Y container))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red))) )
test.nl: The closet must not be opened. Close the door of cupboard. Put the green book in microwave. Pick the blue book up. Put the red cup in microwave. Go to the chair. Put the blue book on the couch. Give the red book to human.
